snippet.title: Management, safety cited for radiation release
snippet.description: A radiation release from the federal government's underground nuclear waste dump in southeastern New Mexico was the result of a slow erosion of the safety culture at the 15-year-old site, which was evident in the bungled response to the emergency, federal investigators said in a report released Thursday.

snippet.title: Airbnb is facing off against New York's Attorney General. Here's why.
snippet.description: The sharing economy's latest growing pain.

snippet.title: Crews find suspected area of radiation leak
snippet.description: Two months after radiation leaked from the federal government's half-mile deep nuclear waste dump in southeastern New Mexico, officials said Thursday that crews have found contamination underground in the area where waste was most recently being stored.

snippet.title: This weekend, everyone had an opinion on Ukraine. Here's a quick guide.
snippet.description: Executives, legislators and international leaders lay out the escalating situation.

snippet.title: Squall line passes D.C. area with little fanfare for most
snippet.description: A tornado watch was issued as a line of showers/storms passed through the region. Damage was confined to St. Mary's county, where there were multiple downed tree reports.

snippet.title: New therapies raise hope for a breakthrough in tackling cancer
snippet.description: "The stuff was like vanishing cream' on an inoperable tumor. Drug gets immune system to fight back

snippet.title: A suburban heroin addict describes his brush with death and his hopes for a better life
snippet.description: A young Bethesda man ODs, but unlike Philip Seymour Hoffman, lives because his friend called 911, and ran

snippet.title: With cancer under control, Jesse Ferguson keeps message under control, too
snippet.description: His job may personify what people hate about D.C. but it got him through cancer.

snippet.title: Wonkbook: Two words to define the 2014 State of the Union: 'executive action'
snippet.description: Today's top five stories: (1) what the State of the Union will be and won't be; (2) Obamacare breaks 3 million; (3) the inequality economy; (4) yes, immigration reform is back; and (5) the environment is the Pope's next subject.

snippet.title: Did Drake just change the arc of his career on 'SNL'?
snippet.description: The brooding rap star was good during his highest-profile foray into comedy. Maybe too good.
